data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 17627, Version Hash: d3e3f2c3d99299b0fb35f08a64252761d68ed06d
data.actual_result: Firefox pushes all of the Integrations to the left side so you would have to scroll up/down to see the rest.
data.expected_result: Show the Integrations with two columns so only one or two is shown per row.
data.short_description: Firefox not fitting all of a user's Discord Integrations in a user page.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user with two or more integrations (Twitter, Twitch, etc) - Go to their profile by right clicking so the User Info tab is shown
